title: 3D Free Kick
description: 3D Free Kick is a sports game. In life, all shots are penalty shots. Whether the goalie is an obstacle or an opportunity, if you're taking a shot at it you're probably on the outs. Soccer is no different, soccer is a game of passes and dashes. Desperate kicks and offensive or defensive plays which require strategic planning and tactical action. When someone goes out of bounds its time for the penalty kick, an opportunity to make up for the zealousness of the opposing teams play. Judge the distance, your speed, and your power levels before executing a perfect kick. Dodge the defense and land the perfect score at the last minute in this dangerously fun game of sports.
controls:
Use your mouse to aim the ball.
Press the left mouse button to activate your kick.
